text.section: An individual who knowingly violates a restriction on movement imposed as a condition of leave, work release, or a home detention order or agreement under this subtitle is guilty of escape as provided in §§ 9-404 through 9-407 of the Criminal Law Article.

An individual who knowingly violates any other condition of leave, work release, or a home detention order or agreement imposed under this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.
